channel.title: One Simple Question
channel.description: I Have One Simple Question. Is There Any Way A Moparscape Admin Can Add A Suggestion Place. So We Can Suggest Things To Update On Forums And They Get Ideas.

item.title: One Simple Question
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

[quote="_Reforced, post:2, topic:216932"]Stop Talking Like This.

It’s just fucking annoying to everyone[/quote]
He has a point, proper grammar is fine, But caps on every word is pretty annoying :/.
However, I kind of see your point.

Read full topic

item.title: One Simple Question
item.dc:creator: @Reforced _Reforced
item.description:
@Reforced wrote:

I know, but I never said that they were going to make a new one.

Read full topic

item.title: One Simple Question
item.dc:creator: @Encouragin Encouragin
item.description:
@Encouragin wrote:

[quote="_Reforced, post:5, topic:216932"][quote author=Encouragin link=topic=285168.msg2310561#msg2310561 date=1215035493]

Stop Talking Like This.

It’s just fucking annoying to everyone, this isn’t RuneScape.

And no, there is no suggestion for this, you should’ve just sent this as a PM to mitb, niall, or lothy.

And I highly doubt they will make one.

They even said they will make a RS2Dv section if RS2Dv really turned into a Server. People already added Items, NPCs and released it and shit. But do you see any sections? lmfao.
[/quote]

Did you see me mention any of that whatsoever?[/quote]
Im just sayin they will never make a new section.

Read full topic

item.title: One Simple Question

Did you see me mention any of that whatsoever?
